item.title: Courses
item.description: 2018/05/29 - 2018/06/01 - FPGA Lessons given at the “XV Seminar on Software for Nuclear, Subnuclear and Applied Physics”

item.title: XV Seminar on Software for Nuclear, Subnuclear and Applied Physics
item.description: I gave 6 hours of hands-on lessons on FPGA programming at the “XV Seminar on Software for Nuclear, Subnuclear and Applied Physics” an INFN school in Alghero.
